Pre-register online for events. All riders must check in to pick up bib numbers. We ask you to reuse your bib number for each race in the series.

Each event will begin with short skills clinics that will focus on specific cyclocross skills. We will offer categories in kids, women, beginners, mid-level, and advanced. Something for all. Each skills clinic is designed to build skills but offers participants the opportunity to experience cyclocross in a fun environment taught by experienced riders. Now you can experience cyclocross before racing for FREE! No registration for this is required just show up ready to have fun and learn a new skill or practice/build on old skills. A good warm-up and opportunity!

A shortened version of the micro-cross course for the little ones. That is doable and fun! Parents can cheer them on and spectators can make it exciting! A great experience on the bike!

A full lap on the micro-course for the kids wanting to try it out and experience a good time on the bike!

Male and female riders will start at the same time but be scored separately. Riders of any age can join this group. This category is perfect for those wanting to try it out and experience the awesomeness of cyclocross.

Female and male riders will start at the same time but be scored separately. Riders of any age can join this category. 30 minutes of good times and fun will be had!

Female and male riders will start at the same time but be scored separately. Riders of any age can join this group. 45 minutes of racing or just jump in to have fun-it's up to you and we support it all!
